item.title: Skupper.io: communication across Kubernetes clusters
item.description: This post was originally published on Red Hat Developers, the community to learn, code, and share faster. To read the original post, click here. In the past few years, the popularity and adoption of containers has skyrocketed, and the Kubernetes container orchestration platform has been largely adopted as well. With these changes, a new set of challenges has emerged when dealing with applications deployed on Kubernetes clusters in the real world.
